body: Ahhhh fuck
Is there some sort of tag for this particular flavour of soul-crushingly depressing storytelling? Because holy shit this is up there with some of the darkest stuff I've ever read.

She died. But because of that vision I can atleast to some extent agree: ignorance is a bliss, at times
Its the first time i cried because a hentai ;-;

ShindoL himself released a public statement that ill fated heroine does indeed kill herself rather then live with the anguish of having failed as a mother before she even got a chance to really give it a try. There is no room for debate or speculation when the creator himself says its a full on tragedy with no happy outcome outside of the fact that at least she was able to find peace in death that evaded her in life.
It be like that sometimes

Why do people debate whether this had a good ending or not, it clearly didn't end on a happy ending. The child within died because of these people messing with her and kicking her belly, she then purposely killed herself by overdosing and the "happy part" you see at the end is the drug kicking in and her last sight.

damn. Shindol works always get me like everytime.
I wish Shindol make a guro story about those people who beat her.
I felt so sad for her it feels sad that you have to lose something before you change but I'm glad it was a happy ending. Those fucked up people who beat her needs to get arrested!

People are still clinging to the belief she lived? Really? ShindoL him self has stated very clearly a while ago that he had Saki die in the end (he states this in the afterwords/postscript section of the tankoubon for this), the whole scene with the daughter is a fleeting glimpse of a future that could have been. Baby almost certainly died with her, I mean the beating alone would have done the trick (a unborn child's skull is very fragile, no way that alone survived the brutal blunt force trauma her belly was subjected too), but add in she'd been on drugs during the course of her pregnancy and then fatally ODed in the end the odds were so stacked against the baby that survival chances were nil. Bottom line is the canon story ends in tragedy. People here need to accept that, you don't need to like it but thats what is canon according to the creator himself which means there is no room for legitimate speculation the deal has already been sealed.
This is depraved shit

This is what a full unpressed syringe looks like:

https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/t/syringe-full-clear-fluid-plunger-medical-green-tip-ml-against-white-background-89692314.jpg

This, however, is what an empty and pressed syringe looks like: 

https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRZvE-Z4YZgONa-9XbdGiQkQwv7iJ-cKJ-WUCejUHvX4OQ3LkJf

She injected the drug: 

https://i.nhentai.net/galleries/943053/34.jpg

Fuck those delinquents... They should be tortured to death...

No. The syringe was empty already. It was pressed full. Look at the syringe's plunger, only a little of the top portion is out. If it wasnt used the top portion should be longer, meaning the plunger should still be out. So she did inject the drug. She died from overdose. That was her last dream. Notice how blank her eyes were in the first parts of her dream with the kid. She also got confused, notice the "huh". She just got on with the flow of her dreams.

Fuck those brats who robbed and physically assaulted her. Im in a rage. I want to scrape their skin alive.
Btw...notice how the "Dear" in last page has no heart below it...if it was drug...it would have one cuz she would die in ecstasy...but it didn't so she most probably lived...

Though it looks like her face on page 34 says she's​ dreaming...it could also be the baby coming out through her internal contractions/spasms so she's in bliss/relieved I guess, the syringe is still full in page 34...more or less full...so I think she didn't inject the drug...and it feels more like she was waking up from a sleep in page 35 rather than going into deep sleep cause her reaction in the first panel is uneasy...and she says "You we're the seed of my rebirth" so I guess she lived and left behind her past...the last page's broken glasses, empty drug packet and the blood drops says she left her past behind...anyways...why isn't this mainstream...this is genius...why would people read shit like those romance mangas...this is far better...anyways...my boner died so...cheerio
But I think she lived...Tho her water broke and blood's flowing out...there have been cases where the baby lived through such conditions

Hmm...I think the artist tries to say that it's up to you how you want it to end...you choose wether it's happy or not...I think this one was hella depraved shit...but I believe happiness awaits everyone in their demise
She didnt die, look at the needle its still full. She probably felt the baby kick and stopped before she injected the drugs.

She had an illusion and died or she's remembering the past. Believe what you want, but she's probably dead, no one gave a shit to her in that place, so the authorities would take too long to find her. It's a waste, too.
Opss, Its ShindoL hahaha bad habit of mine not putting H right next to the first letter of names or at the last part tehe sowreyy

Even though you would not put the last page next after you remove the tragic scene in some of the last panels its fine you will recieve the happy ending. And if  you disregard the last  page so what it would be well last page, page 39 wanted tell us "It's up to you hentai fappers lol" You guys wondering why a random noob like me think of this and that shit...well it's-it's just that, the moment Saki smiled I think its on page 34 last panel. The part when she smiled damn I already feels the emotion, the brusting emotion, feels like the author  saying to me this smile is the ending i want for my manga and yet their is still more pages how come that the pages 34 is too satisfying yet there is still more?! Then is read the page 35, it made me turmoil and started to analize the whole stuff and ended up put my effort in the comment section well sorry guys. It's just an opinion though you guys dont have to agree with in the end after all tehehe ^…^~

As well in the part were Saki said the "It's okay, itsowkeey" and to the "I've nothing now" (if this is not the exact sentences I'm sowrey. XD) then in author's satisfaction   the story, the heroine met her tragic end it started in the when the random man pretend not to see her or maybe in the scene when Saki said "not the baby". For me it started in the fcking man, thats the tragic one. Now try to remove the trgic panels.

you are about to read it, it's not for the faint of heart. Remember.

[SPOILERS]

So, bad news everyone. She is dead. Given her condition, and then taking another "shot", to lessen the pain, she's clearly lost hope in living. 
But she smiled before the mom-daughter sequence, so you could say she is dreaming. Dreaming before passing on...
And then the last shot tells it all. Broken glasses, blood, and the plastic pack containing drugs, all indicating it didn't went well in the end.
No pity, only sympathies. RIP Saki.

Personally, if this really happens with people IRL, I am equally disgusted and scared. Who knows how many girls (or maybe even boys) get stuck in this vicious cycle and the people taking advantage of them (even those near and dear to them)... I take mangas(or anime or movies) like these and thank for whatever fine life I'm having right now, and hope for betterment for others as well.

@phantom13 Sadly as much as I wanted her to live, she most likely died from an overdose. The final panels, are probably her last moments of ecstasy, because of the drug.

For those ho say she die, in the last pannel before she appear whit her daugther she still has the glasses in the head, so if she die how the glasses end up in the floor? the last pannel whit the broken glasses are just a representation of what she left behind in order the repair her life. Shindol make a thind of depresing works but sometimes he do a good endingd as well. The saki was in my opinion the least bad character, she made mistakes, but never harmed anyone, unlike the hypocritical society under a false moralism chased, mistreated, raped and robbed. It was the true face of evil without remorse.

I believe that saki survived and she was remembering everything that she's been through, their mistakes and failures. This manga to my view comes the full human freedom in doing everything, but also the consequences of our choices. She was a young man who unfortunately didn't know make the best choices and suffered from extreme way, in the end had the chance to repent and change.

Nothing prevents in the story that saki was rescued, their attackers arrested, his daughter recovered and your money, when the police showed up, was taken to hospital and received amparo until State could survive with your job when it was bigger. In the end she just repensava the moments in which she lived. A person having an overdose cannot have a mind as clear as what she had, would be steeped in psychedelic dreams, but not in a dream she rethinks the past.

There is no open ending. Look closely at the last page. She saying "...dear" to her daughter, but you can see tiled floor and a package with drugs on the left side of the page.

A lot of evidence point towards her overdosing, mainly towards the end. Blood pouring out after her stomach taking a beating; her money for the baby being stolen. To top it off, she said she "had nothing left", which can mean she has nothing left to live for due to losing her baby and the money for it. The last shot before the flashback is her taking one last shot of the drug.
Oh fuck you I could take it all until that final hit in the feels; this was hot as shit for the first 5 chapters

No Im not talking about only glasses , I mean the gushing blood coming out of her after she got beaten,  the effect of  drugs she took so far ,  her facial expression after she OD'D;  they are all  pointing at the bad ending. Only a hopeless optimist or a fool would ignore all these evidence and just  believe  that she gave birth without problems  and living in a happy way with her child at the end.  Glasses is just a reminder of her past and it ending up on floor next to blood stains  is a metaphor  for her death.   It's all there to see you just need to look harder .

'The evidence is right there', so some glasses on the floor show that she died 100%, you really need to open your eyes and think more, those glasses being on the floor could've been the result of anything.

This story is too real for me. My cousin is a prostitute and she got pregnant from a random guy the same as this story. She contracted diseases as well as heavily using heroin and smoking crack and weed. She is so far gone from reality that she no longer cares about anything even herself. I literally dragged her out the middle of the street one day and tried to explain to her how low she has fallen. Even though she listened, i could see that she was off in her own world and unless i was willing to lock her up by force, she would go back again and again. She is in jail now where she had her child and have been forced off of drugs. She was locked up for prostituting. One of the few times i was so happy to see the police arrest a family member. This story is too real for me so it killed my boner instantly.
That was really hard to read to the end but it was worth it. I prefer to see it as the good ol happy end, otherwise it would just have been pure suffering until the end :(
